column2: crs1950, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I have taken Stalevo 150 for four years now. I had to increase the dosage from 3X daily to 5X daily. I was in constant pain and stiffness,since increasing dosage, I feel much pain free and more mobile. Hope I can  keep taking this dosage.

column2: Steav , 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: WIthout Stalevo, muscle rigidity is severe; with it I have a reasonable window of normalcy that is tenuous at best and unpredictable in its duration of efficacy. Q4h is an annoying schedule, but tolerable.

column2: mso, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: BEEN SEARCHING FOR A GOOD DRUG BALANCE, SELEGILENE & STALEVO WORK WELL FOR ME & HAS NOW FOR A YEAR. (2 yr diagnosed)--hope it gets even better during the down times

column2: Margaret, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: I was diagnosed in 2004, at the age of 55.But had the tremors for 10 years prior to that. Stalevo helps my body to be less ridget and I have less down time.

column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
